video.title: Agatha Christie's Poirot
video.synopsis: David Suchet stars as master sleuth Hercule Poirot, who investigates murders and other confounding crimes with the help of the affable Capt. Hastings.

episodes.synopsis: Finding a missing cook proves tougher, and more suited to his superior skills, than Poirot expects.
episodes.title: The Adventure of Clapham Cook

episodes.synopsis: On Guy Fawkes Night, Poirot is called in on a case he suspects is murder made to look like suicide.
episodes.title: Murder in the Mews

episodes.synopsis: A country squire hires Poirot to investigate threats against his young son.
episodes.title: The Adventure of Johnnie Waverly

episodes.synopsis: Poirot's keen powers of observation and culinary know-how help him solve a murder case.
episodes.title: Four and Twenty Blackbirds

episodes.synopsis: Poirot is at loose ends until he finds a mystery to solve very close to home.
episodes.title: The Third Floor Flat

episodes.synopsis: Alone on a holiday in Greece, Poirot cracks a murder case with the help of two capable Brits.
episodes.title: Triangle at Rhodes

episodes.synopsis: Their Mediterranean holiday is interrupted when Poirot and Hastings are called on to investigate a shipboard murder.
episodes.title: Problem at Sea

episodes.synopsis: Poirot takes on a case of national importance when secret plans for a military combat aircraft disappear.
episodes.title: The Incredible Theft

episodes.synopsis: When Poirot and Hastings confront a murder in the movie-making community, a playing card found nears the body is their only clue.
episodes.title: The King of Clubs

episodes.synopsis: A wealthy man asks Poirot to investigate even though nothing has happened but a recurring bad dream.
episodes.title: The Dream

episodes.synopsis: While on holiday, Poirot suffers a fall and stumbles onto more than a turned ankle when he encounters an accident-prone heiress of a local estate.
episodes.title: Peril at End House

episodes.synopsis: Poirot's efforts to help a mysterious woman land him on the wrong side of the law.
episodes.title: The Veiled Lady

episodes.synopsis: A map to a valuable silver mine vanishes along with the man who planned to sell it.
episodes.title: The Lost Mine

episodes.synopsis: A woman seeks Poirot's help when she fears her husband is poisoning her.
episodes.title: The Cornish Mystery

episodes.synopsis: A wealthy banker mysteriously disappears on a walk to the post office.
episodes.title: The Disappearance of Mr. Davenheim

episodes.synopsis: Poirot startles Hastings by declaring he intends to retire.
episodes.title: Double Sin

episodes.synopsis: A young couple's real estate bargain arouses Poirot's suspicions.
episodes.title: The Adventures of the Cheap Flat

episodes.synopsis: Not even a high-profile, high-pressure case can ruffle Poirot's trademark cool.
episodes.title: The Kidnapped Prime Minister

episodes.synopsis: To catch a jewel thief, Poirot employs a sleight of hand so deft even Hastings is fooled.
episodes.title: The Adventures of the Western Star

episodes.synopsis: The Cavendish household is wrought with tension due to the marriage of John's widowed mother to a suspicious younger man.
episodes.title: The Mysterious Affair at Styles

episodes.synopsis: Poirot comes up smelling sweet when he looks to the garden for clues in a murder case.
episodes.title: How Does Your Garden Grow?

episodes.synopsis: Poirot and Hastings untangle an international banking caper on the high seas.
episodes.title: The Million Dollar Bond Robbery

episodes.synopsis: After a fateful train trip, a case of romantic intrigue turns deadly.
episodes.title: The Plymouth Express

episodes.synopsis: Poirot gets stung by a wasp and struck by a feeling that all is not well in the life of a friend's son.
episodes.title: Wasps' Nest

episodes.synopsis: After refusing to stoop to fictional crime-solving, Poirot is soon occupied by a real whodunit.
episodes.title: The Tragedy at Marsdon Manor

episodes.synopsis: While Hastings and Miss Lemon work on a high-profile case, Poirot romances a beautiful countess.
episodes.title: The Double Clue

episodes.synopsis: A woman fearing her jealous husband invites Poirot to a fateful dinner party.
episodes.title: The Mystery of the Spanish Chest

episodes.synopsis: International relations are at stake as Poirot hunts for a stolen Egyptian royal jewel.
episodes.title: The Theft of the Royal Ruby

episodes.synopsis: When two revelers at a lavish costume ball are murdered, small but telling clues lead Poirot to the killer.
episodes.title: The Affair at the Victory Ball

episodes.synopsis: Poirot must find a murderer among the members of a quarrelsome hunting party.
episodes.title: The Mystery of Hunter's Lodge

episodes.synopsis: Poirot untangles the baffling mystery of a murderer who announces his next victims through a series of letters, each addressed to the detective.
episodes.title: The ABC Murders

episodes.synopsis: There's murder in the skies as a blackmailer is killed on a plane full of likely suspects. Unfortunately for the culprit, Poirot is also a passenger.
episodes.title: Death in the Clouds

episodes.synopsis: When a popular dentist is gunned down, a murderous chain of events ensues. A broken shoe buckle becomes the key to solving a deadly web of deception.
episodes.title: One, Two, Buckle My Shoe

episodes.synopsis: After an archaeological dig turns deadly, Poirot must distinguish between ordinary evil and an other-worldly curse.
episodes.title: The Adventure of the Egyptian Tomb

episodes.synopsis: Hastings's passion for golf, and Poirot's for art, lead them to the scene of a baffling murder.
episodes.title: The Underdog

episodes.synopsis: The death of a British heiress haunts Poirot for two years before he has a chance to confront her killer.
episodes.title: Yellow Iris

episodes.synopsis: Poirot is the executor of a revised will that disappears when its author dies suddenly.
episodes.title: The Case of the Missing Will

episodes.synopsis: Hastings's decision to buy an elegant Italian car coincides with a case involving an Italian count.
episodes.title: The Adventure of the Italian Nobleman

episodes.synopsis: A trip home to Belgium with Japp causes Poirot to reopen a case that he failed to solve 20 years earlier.
episodes.title: The Chocolate Box

episodes.synopsis: At a furniture auction, Poirot loses in the bidding for an art deco mirror but wins a new client willing to part with the mirror for his services.
episodes.title: Dead Man's Mirror

episodes.synopsis: Poirot tries to take a holiday but is soon required to save the day when a priceless necklace disappears.
episodes.title: Jewel Robbery at the Grand Metropolitan

episodes.synopsis: When a wealthy old man calls for the detective's help, Poirot opts for a working holiday at the man's well-heated country estate.
episodes.title: Hercule Poirot's Christmas

episodes.synopsis: Poirot is incredulous when the impeccable Miss Lemon types a letter riddled with errors. She explains that she's consumed with worry about her sister.
episodes.title: Hickory Dickory Dock

episodes.synopsis: On holiday in Deauville, a French seaside resort, Poirot is recognized and drawn into a case of abduction and murder.
episodes.title: Murder on the Links

episodes.synopsis: Poirot accompanies Hastings to Lake Windermere where Hastings's friend Charles is attempting to set a world speedboat-racing record.
episodes.title: Dumb Witness

episodes.synopsis: Poirot's much-needed retreat to the countryside is interrupted by the murder of a prosperous industrialist.
episodes.title: The Murder of Roger Ackroyd

episodes.synopsis: Following the death of a loathsome aristocrat, Poirot is stymied by his suspects' ironclad alibis.
episodes.title: Lord Edgware Dies

episodes.synopsis: When he takes a holiday at a Devon hotel, Poirot is forced to use all his powers of observation to solve the murder of a fellow guest.
episodes.title: Evil Under the Sun

episodes.synopsis: Poirot and his old friend Capt. Hastings are at an archaeological dig in Mesopotamia when an archaeologist's wife is found dead.
episodes.title: Murder in Mesopotamia

episodes.synopsis: Poirot is called in years after the fact to reexamine the murder of Amyas Crale, whose wife was hanged for the crime.
episodes.title: Five Little Pigs

episodes.synopsis: An heiress is accused of a double murder. Poirot has only five days to investigate the case before she is hanged.
episodes.title: Sad Cypress

episodes.synopsis: A heartbroken woman stalks her former fiancé and his new heiress wife aboard a Nile cruise.
episodes.title: Death On The Nile

episodes.synopsis: A weekend house party is interrupted when a guest is found dying, with his wife holding a gun. But who shot him?
episodes.title: The Hollow

episodes.synopsis: Poirot is called on to investigate the murder of a woman on a train bound for the French Riviera.
episodes.title: The Mystery of the Blue Train

episodes.synopsis: A bridge party host is murdered. Poirot uses psychology and the bridge scores to find the killer, and discovers that four guests have murdered before.
episodes.title: Cards on the Table

episodes.synopsis: At Richard Abernathie's funeral, his niece, Cora, suggests he was probably murdered. The next day, Cora is murdered herself.
episodes.title: After the Funeral

episodes.synopsis: When a stranger is found murdered at Warmsley Vale, the Cloade family asks for Poirot's help.
episodes.title: Taken at the Flood

episodes.synopsis: When Mrs. McGinty is killed by a brutal blow to the head, Poirot takes on the challenge of proving that the man convicted of the killing is innocent.
episodes.title: Mrs. McGinty's Dead

episodes.synopsis: The priceless jewels belonging to a princess attending school in England cannot be found. Poirot soon finds that things are not quite as they seem.
episodes.title: Cat Among the Pigeons

episodes.synopsis: When a young heiress tells Poirot that she may have killed someone, it appears she is being truthful.
episodes.title: Third Girl

episodes.synopsis: When Lady Boynton is murdered while accompanying her family on an archaeological dig in Syria, Poirot is drawn into solving the mystery.
episodes.title: Appointment with Death
